dtliExcerpt: This exuberant revival of the 1944 Bernstein-Comden-Green musical captures all the high-spirited energy and romantic optimism of three sailors on 24-hour shore leave in New York City.
bwwExcerpt: John Rando, embraces both the strengths and weaknesses of the musical...Trying to modernize On the Town would make it seem hopelessly quaint.
